message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a method for general scene text recognition, which involves computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP) techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also uses attention-based sequence recognition network, which is a common technique in NLP, suggesting that it could also belong to cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also mentions weak supervision, which is a common topic in machine learning (ML), suggesting that it could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves image rectification, which is a common topic in image processing (IP), suggesting that it could also belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper proposes a novel method for text recognition, which could also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
